name: Take a Breath (screams from the cellar)
name_original: Take a Breath (screams from the cellar)
description:
For "Mini Jam 73 - Power"

Your spaceship is low on power and you're trapped in an asteroid belt! You can only divert power to one system at a time! Activate your thrusters to move, bash asteroids with your shield, or refill your oxygen. Navigate your way out of the asteroid belt, but don't forget to refill your Oxygen levels!
